Question: Cassius also wanted to prevent this person from bringing reinforcements for Antony and Octavian.
Hints: He renewed his relationship with this person, and from this point on, Alexandria was his home.
This person arrived in great state, and so charmed Antony that he chose to spend the winter of 41 BC–40 BC with her in Alexandria.
This person tore off her clothes and covered him with them.
